price: Kuma ka cẽ wa bãyiNa, su faɗi kalma* wadda take mafi kyau. Lalle ne Shaiɗan yanã sanya ɓarna a tsakãninsu. Lalle ne Shaiɗan ya kasance ga mutum, maƙiyi bayyanan ne.
arabic: وَقُل لِّعِبَادِي يَقُولُواْ ٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُۚ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ يَنزَغُ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ عَدُوّٗا مُّبِينٗا
footnotes: * Ka ce wa bãyĩNa, mutãne, idan sunã magana su auna kalmõmin da suke zance da su, sa'an nan su riƙa amfãni da kalma mafi kyãwo dõmin kada shaiɗan ya sãmi mashiga daga maganarsu zuwa ga zukãtansu, ya sanya ɓarna a tsakãninsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
